720115f-c.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Pitt Street
720115f-c.text:
(1)
Grand Street, north side, east from but not including Pitt, to and including Columbia Streets. On the extreme left, is the Neighborhood Theatre, 466-470 Geand Street, adjoining the N.E.
corner of Pitt Street.
April 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.  N2G ~ E573
(2)
The same, a closer view of Grand Street, at, adjoining and
east of the N.E. corner of Pitt Street.
October 28, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The aame, as No. 2, showing maimly the Neighborhood Theatre.
October 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
720115f-c.folder: Grand Street & Pitt Street, Manhattan, NY

720113f-a.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Pitt Street
720113f-a.text:
458-460 Grand Street, adjoining the N.W. corner of Pitt Street, showing
the store-front of a 7-story building.
March 26, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
